title: them by section 11(1) of the Public Service Management Act 1997 (No. 27 of
heading: 1. This Order may be cited as the Appointment of Special Advisers
text_raw:
1. This Order may be cited as the Appointment of Special Advisers 
(Tánaiste, Minister for Foreign Affairs and Trade and Minister for Defence) (No. 
3) Order 2025.
text_norm: 1 order may cited appointment special adviser (tanaiste minister foreign affair trade minister defence) (no 3) order 2025

title: them by section 11(1) of the Public Service Management Act 1997 (No. 27 of
heading: 2. Each person mentioned in the Schedule, particulars of each of whose
text_raw:
2. Each person mentioned in the Schedule, particulars of each of whose 
address have been deposited at the offices of the Department of Defence, is 
appointed to be a Special Adviser to the Tánaiste and Minister for Foreign 
Affairs and Trade with effect from the date opposite mention of that person.
text_norm: 2 person mentioned schedule particular whose address deposited office department defence appointed special adviser tanaiste minister foreign affair trade effect date opposite mention person

title: them by section 11(1) of the Public Service Management Act 1997 (No. 27 of
heading: 3. Each person mentioned in the Schedule, particulars of each of whose
text_raw:
3. Each person mentioned in the Schedule, particulars of each of whose 
address have been deposited at the offices of the Department of Defence, is 
appointed to be a Special Adviser to the Tánaiste and Minister for Defence with 
effect from the date opposite mention of that person. 

Notice of the making of this Statutory Instrument was published in 
"Iris Oifigiúil" of 13th June, 2025. 

 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 [340] 3
text_norm: 3 person mentioned schedule particular whose address deposited office department defence appointed special adviser tanaiste minister defence effect date opposite mention person notice making statutory instrument published iris oifigiuil 13th june 2025 340 3

title: them by section 11(1) of the Public Service Management Act 1997 (No. 27 of
heading: Max Murphy

MICHEÁL MARTIN, 
Taoiseach.
